item.title: Knowledge and Structural-Power in the International Political Economy
item.description: Mytelka, Lynn K. “Knowledge and Structural-Power In Strange Power: Shaping the Parameters of International Relations and International Political Economy, edited by Thomas Lawton, James Rosenau, Amy C. Verdun, 61-78. London: Routledge, 2000. Keywords: Knowledge; Structural Power, Power; Europe; Political Economy; International Relations Text access (external link)
